TopicTitle: My First Spaceplane Landing (On A Runway) From Orbit!

Articles.Content:
So I made a TSTO tourist spaceplane that works really well, but up until this point, I have been landing it in random fields because I always miss a runway, but I finally managed to get this thing to the dessert (that wasn't a typo) airfield! You will not believe how excited I was when I realized I could make it.

 

This is a screenshot I took after landing

(yes it is conventional geared, it was more stable than tricycle gear believe it or not)

Edited September 15, 2021 by Nicodo123
Congrats. This is one of the most satisfying accomplishments in the game.
Yep! It took me like five tries (using quicksaves) to land back at the KSC, not on the runway, but on the field next to it . Keep up the awesome work @Nicodo123, practice always makes perfect!
I've been practicing a lot more, and now i can routinely land at the KSC runway without missing on the first try almost every time
That's better than I after playing for 8 years.
